title: Artifact- NFT for Real Property
description: Real estate transactions are inefficient and lack transparency on both **Buyer** and **Seller** sides of the transaction.
solution: Encode financing due diligence into "proof of funds" NFTs; and real property records/rights into property owner's "bundle of rights" NFTs
experience:
++Team:++

15+ combined years of software development, plutus pioneer, 5 years of real estate investing, brokerage and escrow experience
